SEARCH

Uses of Package
JEST

Packages that use JEST
Package
Description
JEST
This package contains the general classes of JEST: Game : this is the most important class of the game.
JEST.model.cards.trophy
This package contains all the trophies of the game : We have the interface Trophy which is implemented by the 6 classes for each trophy.
JEST.model.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
  • Classes in JEST used by JEST
    Class
    Description
    Game
    The class starts a game, load or save one, play a round, and determines the winner.
    Main
    The class allows the game to run and the player to use the console.
    Player
    This class defines a player, real or virtual.

    This class defines a player, real or virtual.
